explains: v. 指导（某人）的工作；监督（任务，计划，活动）
wordGroup: supervise the manufacture of 监制

sentences.en: I supervise the packing of all mail orders.
sentences.cn: 我监督所有邮购商品的包装。

sentences.en: A team was sent to supervise the elections in Nicaragua.
sentences.cn: 一队人马被派去监督尼加拉瓜的选举。

sentences.en: The U.N. pledged to help supervise the clearance of mines.
sentences.cn: 联合国承诺帮助监督扫雷工作。
